properties.entry: INSERT INTO books (book_title, book_author, book_publisher, book_genre, book_status, borrow_count) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE books SET book_title = ?, book_author = ?, book_publisher = ?, book_genre = ?, book_status = ?, borrow_count = ? WHERE book_code = ?
SELECT book_code, book_title, book_author, book_publisher, book_genre, book_status, borrow_count FROM books WHERE book_code = ?
SELECT book_code, book_title, book_author, book_publisher, book_genre, book_status, borrow_count FROM books WHERE book_title LIKE ?

SELECT b.book_code, b.book_title, b.book_author, b.book_publisher, b.book_genre, b.book_status, b.borrow_count FROM books b JOIN book_category bc ON b.book_code = bc.book_code WHERE bc.category_id = ?

SELECT b.book_code, b.book_title, b.book_author, b.book_publisher, b.book_genre, b.book_status, b.borrow_count FROM books b JOIN borrow_records br ON b.book_code = br.book_code WHERE br.due_date < NOW() AND br.return_date IS NULL
